auth.title: Provider Sign In
auth.subtitle: Sign in to manage your vacancy listings
auth.forgotPasswordHelp: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetEmailSent: Check your email for a password reset link.

onboarding.title: Complete Your Provider Profile
onboarding.subtitle: Help families find your childcare program
onboarding.licenseNumberHelp: Your 9-digit license number from CA Community Care Licensing
onboarding.enterLicensePrompt: Enter your California FCC license number to get started
onboarding.licenseVerificationFailed: License number not found in state database. Please check and try again.
onboarding.licenseNotActive: This license is not currently active. Please contact CCLD if you believe this is an error.

vacancy.title: Report Vacancies
vacancy.subtitle: Update your current openings
vacancy.listingLiveDesc: Families searching for childcare in {location} can see your program. Remember to update your vacancy info when your availability changes.
vacancy.validation: Please indicate at least one opening or age group you are accepting
vacancy.errorNoOpenings: Please enter at least one available spot
vacancy.complianceCapacityError: You have {enrolled} enrolled with {capacity} capacity. Only {available} spots available, but reporting {reporting}.
vacancy.complianceInfantWarning: CA Reg 102416.5: With {total} total children, max {allowed} can be infants. You would have {infants} infants.
vacancy.visibilityNote: Your listing will be visible to families searching for childcare.
vacancy.keepUpdatedNote: Please keep this updated to help families find accurate information.
vacancy.waitlistHelp: Check this if you maintain a waitlist when full. Parents can contact you to join.
vacancy.embedDescription: Add this code to your website to show your current availability to families. It updates automatically when you change your vacancy status.
vacancy.embedNote: Works with any website builder that allows custom HTML.

rosterSummary.title: Current Roster Status
rosterSummary.subtitle: Based on your enrolled children
rosterSummary.autoFillHelp: This will update the form below based on your current roster
rosterSummary.addChildrenHelp: Add children to your Roster to see capacity analysis
rosterSummary.needSchoolAge: To reach {licensed} capacity, you need at least 1 child age 6+ and 1 child in K-12. Current effective capacity: {effective}.

publicListings.title: SF Family Child Care Vacancies
publicListings.subtitle: Find available childcare spots in San Francisco
publicListings.noMatchesHelp: Try adjusting your filters or search
publicListings.footer: A service of the San Francisco Family Child Care Association
publicListings.areYouProvider: Are you a licensed FCC provider?
publicListings.signInPrompt: Sign in to report your vacancies
publicListings.waitlistInfo: This program is currently full but maintains a waitlist. Contact them to inquire about joining their waitlist.

settings.title: Program Settings
settings.subtitle: Update your program information
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

projections.title: Capacity Projections
projections.subtitle: Plan ahead with enrollment forecasts
projections.noProjectedChanges: No projected changes in the next 12 months.

eligibility.title: Check if you qualify for FREE or reduced-cost childcare
eligibility.subtitle: Answer 2 quick questions - No personal info saved
eligibility.householdHint: Include all people in your home
eligibility.disclaimer: This is a quick estimate only. No information is saved.
eligibility.nextStep: Next Step: Contact a Resource & Referral Agency
eligibility.nextStepDesc: They'll help you apply and find openings near you.
eligibility.agencyNote: Both agencies provide the same services - choose based on language preference or location.

results.eligible: Great news! You may qualify for FREE childcare
results.eligibleDesc: Based on your household size and income, you may be eligible for:
results.discount: You may qualify for reduced-cost childcare
results.discountDesc: Starting July 2026, you may be eligible for 50% off tuition.
results.overIncome: Based on income alone, you may not qualify
results.overIncomeDesc: However, eligibility depends on many factors beyond income.

elfaFree.title: SF ELFA - Fully Funded (FREE)
elfaFree.desc: Fully-funded tuition for SF residents earning up to 110% AMI

elfaCredit100.title: SF ELFA - 100% Tuition Credit (FREE)
elfaCredit100.desc: 100% tuition credit for SF residents earning 111-150% AMI

elfaDiscount50.title: SF ELFA - 50% Discount
elfaDiscount50.desc: 50% off tuition for SF residents earning 151-200% AMI

headStart.title: Head Start / Early Head Start
headStart.desc: Comprehensive early learning program for ages 0-5

otherOptions.title: Other options to explore:
otherOptions.sliding: Sliding scale fees at some providers
